message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
I'll take the majority, but I'm willing to give you a small share. What do you think?

I'll take a larger share, but I'll give you a small token of appreciation. Don't expect more!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a fair share. Meet me in the middle?

You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you a tiny share, but don't expect any more mercy.
I'm down to my last chance, Bob. I'll take 15% of the remaining value. That's the best I can do.
